content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Now, let's discuss the price. What would you be willing to pay for a brand new, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center with all amenities nearby?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would say 500 euros per month seems appropriate for the apartment. It is quite modern and has a great location. It's also unfurnished, so I would need to buy my own furniture.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros is far too low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the property and the prime location. Could you consider increasing your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I can consider increasing my offer. How about 700 euros per month? This is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center, in my opinion.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 700 euros is more in line with what I had in mind. However, given the current demand for city center apartments, I believe we can still do better. Would you be willing to go up to 800 euros per month? This would be a fair reflection of the market value and the convenience of the location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand your point. Given the quality of the apartment and its prime location, 800 euros per month is a reasonable price. I agree to the price of 800 euros [=] I agree to the price of 800 euros [=] I agree to the price of 800 euros [!]
[[/section]
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I agree to the price of 800 euros! [=] I agree to the price of 800 euros [=] I agree to the price of 800 euros [!]
[[/section]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
